description: The ABCDDB file can be found in the following directory:
UserHome(Home Icon) > Library > Application Support > AddressBook
NOTE: OS X Mountain Lion replaced the Address Book application with the Contacts application.

common_filenames.description: AddressBook-v22.abcddb - If your Address Book contacts aren't displaying correctly, quit the application, move this file from the "AddressBook" folder to your desktop, and start up the Address Book application again.
